title: Hardwood Floors, Granite Countertops, Stainless Steel Appliances
posting_body: ['Granite Countertops - Custom Plank Flooring in Living Areas - Stainless Steel Whirlpool Appliances - Large Patios with Private Storage - Front Load Washer & Dryer - Full-Size Bath/Shower - Ceiling Fans', 'Apt#1499A', '- Houston, TX, 77057', '1 bedroom', '$915-1,165', '/mo', '656-889', 'sf', '2 bedroom', '$1,194-1,600', '/mo', '886-1,073', 'sf', 'Deposit:', '350+', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats:Yes\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Dogs:No', 'Built:', '1978', 'Location:', 'Galleria/ Uptown', 'Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability', 'Features:', 'Resort Style Pools, Executive Business Center, Covered Parking, Life Fitness Equipment, Lush, Mature Landscaping', 'Community Amenities:', 'Washer/Dryer, Carports, Elevators, School bus stop, Outdoor Grills, Fitness center, Bus stop, Business center, Perimeter fence, 2 Pools, 2 Laundry rooms, Assigned parking, Gated entrance, Free WiFi Areas', 'Unit Amenities:', 'Self-cleaning ovens, Custom built-ins, Ceiling fans, Premium Appliances, Hi-speed internet, Non-carpeted flooring, Garbage disposals, Ice makers, Dishwashers, Hardwood Floors or Custom carpet, Private patios/balconies, Storage closet outside, Premium Countertops, Cable ready, Miniblinds, Crown molding, Walk-in showers, W/D connections, High ceilings, Walk-in closets, Microwaves', 'For more information about this community contact:', 'Mary Kay Noone\xa0\xa0(Agent)', 'Apartment Living Locators', 'show contact info', 'Refer to Apt#1499A', 's29027  a1499A  ad2361 i']
